name: Low-Carb Roasted Cauliflower Soup
author: HeatherRigby
summary: Easy and delicious, low-carb, no-dairy, cauliflower soup. Hit that thing with some hot sauce, if you like.
ingredients: 1 medium head cauliflower, cut into florets
2 cloves garlic, sliced, or more to taste
1 sprig fresh rosemary, leaves removed and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place cauliflower florets into a bowl of lightly salted water and soak for 20 minutes
Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Broil in the preheated oven until brown on top, 20 to 30 minutes
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a soup pot over medium-high heat
Saute onion and garlic in the hot oil until translucent, 5 to 7 minutes
Add broth, rosemary, salt, and pepper
Let simmer until cauliflower is ready
Stir cauliflower into the broth with cashews and tahini
Bring to a boil; reduce heat and let simmer for 10 to 15 minutes
Add avocado and blend using an immersion blender
